title: The Historical Reality of Jesus
itunes:title: The Historical Reality of Jesus
description: Friends, a couple years ago, there was a poll conducted in Great Britain that revealed that the majority of people there feel that Jesus was not a real, historical figure, but rather more of a mythic character. There are all kinds of spiritual systems that trade in mythic language bearing spiritual truths—but that’s not what Christianity is.

There are all kinds of spiritual systems that trade in mythic language bearing spiritual truths—but that’s not what Christianity is.

itunes:author: Bishop Robert Barron
